customer_name: Carolyns Country Cousins L L C
site_name: CAROLYNS COUNTRY COUSINS L L C
narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during the second pre-license inspection for a C license.
OK to license.
Applicant will send a payment of $225.00 to the Western Regional Office for the license fee.
No regulated activity may be conducted until receipt of the USDA license. 
 
The inspection and an exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
